page.title: 09FARMS IN NASSINGTON.
page.content: There are six farms in our block.Two of them belong to Mr.C Fenn.He owns Manor Farm and Home Farm. Both are medium sized, about 500 acres. Mr.Fenn keeps both animals and crops on the farms. Mr.Fenn uses a lot of machines like tractors,bailers,combines and ploughs etc. The water for the animals comes from a tap and a well.Four people work on the farms to help Mr.Fenn with the crops.Mr.Fenns farm is 100 years old. Mr Fenns grandfather owned the farm before Mr.Fenn. Mr. Fenns farm has changed a lot because all the machinery has taken over from the horses,but nothing else has changed since. Every field of Mr.Fenns farms are in our block.Mr.Fenns fields are very big. They have big fields so that they can get their big machines in the fields.Many farmers in the area have removed hedgerows to enlarge fields.
